translations: adj.装门面的，表面的；化妆用的，美容的；整容的；不重要的，没意义的

sentences.sentence: Melanie plunked her cosmetic case down on a chair.
sentences.translation: 梅拉妮把化妆盒漫不经心地扔到了椅子上。

sentences.sentence: She received a cosmetic makeover at a beauty salon as a birthday gift.
sentences.translation: 作为生日礼物，她得到了在一家美容院美容的机会。

sentences.sentence: A selection of cosmetic companies will be there to demonstrate their new products.
sentences.translation: 一些化妆品公司会在那里展示他们的新产品。
